posts.post_content:
Given my budget restraints while collecting the set, I often bought cards with good fronts, bad backs because I could get a beautiful card at a bargain.  This sale is for collectors who share those values.
Most of these 13 have no creases, with fronts that would grade VG-EX or better and backs that I don't dwell upon.
Given what they cost me, at $185 they're a bargain.

If you want an individual card/cards, let me know and I'll give you a price. First taker gets it. 

Most forms of payment okay. If paypal, pay as friend; thanks.

I am always looking to upgrade [Good or better], so if you're interested in trading please send me a list of what you have. I prefer ungraded cards.

No pm's, please. Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url], or post here. 

Lattimore,
Clark,
Stephens,
Fiene throwing,
Bradley batting,
Pfeister throwing,
Egan,
Purtell,
Dunn, Brooklyn [spots of paper-loss on belt and in right-hand border], 
Manning,
Purtell,
Doolan,
Birmingham.

*Note on Scans: As the page is turned, the backs are in reverse order. Also, the cards are in two protective plastics, a halved penny-sleeve--which creates the appearance of a vertical line on each card--and a pocket-page:
